titleStmt.title: A profitable and necessarye doctrine with certayne homelyes adioyned therunto / set forth by the reuerend father in God, Edmunde Byshop of London ...
titleStmt.author: Bonner, Edmund, 1500?-1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Poules Churchyarde, at the sygne of the Holy Ghost, by Ihon Cawoode ...,

notesStmt.note: "Homelies" (STC 3285.5) has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Imprint date suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints and STC (2nd ed.).
First part has imprint at colophon: Excusum Londini in edibus Iohannis Cawodi ...
Second part has pages numbered on recto only.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
